name: Excavator - Yanmar SV 80
description: Two buckets, hydraulic quick change and comes with hoe pak.

description: Having zero clearance, this unit is great for big jobs in tight spots.

name: Bobcats - S185 / S650
description: Great for small jobs around the yard. Both come with air conditioned cab and the S650 has dual controls. Various attachments available.

name: Mini Excavators - Yanmar 35 (2)
description: These mini excavators are ideal for rock walls, backyard landscaping, etc...

name: Roller - Ingersoll/Rand SD-70D
description: Two buckets, hydraulic quick change and comes with hoe pak.

name: Dump Trailer - Trailtech
description: Can be used to haul up to 5 yards.
